attributes.action: Close down government because you haven't passed anything significant in ages.
attributes.background:
The major policies which have had an effect on us are:
Mandatory weekend
Mandatory annual leave
Clean air act
NHS

These are important but we have 650 mp's each on 70k per year and they haven't passed any policies as significant as these in 50 years.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about a lack of major legislation but we're not sure that closing down government will change that.

You could start a new petition setting out the legislation you would like to see.
